challenges.description:
Visit the hexagonal bridge feature across the pond in toa payoh park count the number of hexagons. Perform a dance together that is the number of hexagons * 5 seconds long. eg if there are 5 hexagons, dance up till the 25s mark of the song.
Video link: https://youtu.be/Qj1u3Uke_00?si=fOX-vefyQI1ysCRR
